text: 49|13|He manara sampradaya! Niscaya ami tomalokaka ejana purausa arau ejani naraira paraa srsti karaicho, arau tomalokaka bibhakta karaicho bibhinna jati arau gotrata, yate tomaloke ejane anajanara lagata paraicita haâ€™ba paraa. Tomalokara majata allahara ocarata kerala se'i byaktiye'i bechi maryadasila yijana tomalokara majata bechi takbaraa sampanna. Niscaya allaha sarbajna, samyaka arahita.
